images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will highlight the cultural festivals in Thailand, particularly Loy Krathong, showcasing the vibrant and exotic atmosphere of the destination during autumn.
AI-selected These icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users through the booking process and highlighting special offers related to travel to Thailand.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting sunny beaches, cultural landmarks, and autumn vibes

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thailand during the autumn season
assetRequirements.content_context: featuring beaches, festivals, and local culture

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Тайский рай ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will highlight the cultural festivals in Thailand, particularly Loy Krathong, showcasing the vibrant and exotic atmosphere of the destination during autumn.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
